description: Jane is a revered pastor at Graceful Light Church who offers spiritual guidance to members of her religious community.
relationship: Emily is Jane’s close friend outside the congregation, and they often chat on Slack. Within her pastoral role, Jane also interacts with parishioners and church groups such as John Smith (a congregant seeking counsel), Susan Lee (a congregant requesting prayers), Peter Johnson (a congregant appreciative of pastoral support), Mark Thompson, Lisa Green, the Graceful Light Fellowship Committee, the Youth Group, and the Choir Director.
